verses.name: Acts 18:12
verses.text: And when Gallio was the deputy of Achaia, the Jews made insurrection with one accord against Paul, and brought him to the judgment seat,

verses.name: Acts 18:13
verses.text: Saying, This fellow persuadeth men to worship God contrary to the law.

verses.name: Acts 18:14
verses.text: And when Paul was now about to open his mouth, Gallio said unto the Jews, If it were a matter of wrong or wicked lewdness, O ye Jews, reason would that I should bear with you:

verses.name: Acts 18:15
verses.text: But if it be a question of words and names, and of your law, look ye to it; for I will be no judge of such matters.
